casebody.data:
COURTNEY NC LLC
v.
BALDWIN 219P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2017 Monette Baldwin, for Baldwin, Monette. A Bartlett White, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Stephanie D'Atri, Attorney at Law, for Courtney NC, LLC The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of July 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of July 2017." Beasley, J. recused
